attributes.action: allow snoop dogg into the country
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many fans have been left disappointed that the rapper has not been allowed to enter the country, and i feel that this is not just because he was involved in an "incident" at heathrow airport. Many other countries have allowed the rapper to enter, and i feel this stance should be adopted by the UK. I would also like to say that this is completely unfathamable considering that it wasn't long ago that a convicted rapist and criminal (Mike Tyson) was given the opportunity to come here.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
